description: Extract content from Microsoft Learn and GitHub URLs and store it in PocketBase for easy retrieval and search. Manage documents with tools for extraction, listing, searching, retrieval, and deletion. Benefit from real-time server statistics, dynamic tool management, and multi-transport support including STDIO and HTTP.

capabilities.name: extract_document
capabilities.description: Extract document content from Microsoft Learn or GitHub URL and store in PocketBase

capabilities.name: list_documents
capabilities.description: List stored documents from PocketBase with pagination

capabilities.name: search_documents
capabilities.description: Search documents by title or content using full-text search

capabilities.name: get_document
capabilities.description: Get a specific document by ID with full content

capabilities.name: delete_document
capabilities.description: Delete a document from PocketBase by ID

capabilities.name: ensure_collection
capabilities.description: Check if the documents collection exists and create it if needed

capabilities.name: collection_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about the documents collection including statistics
